Uses of Class
apryraz.eworld.AMessage

  • Uses of AMessage in apryraz.eworld

    Methods in apryraz.eworld that return AMessage
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    AMessage
    EnvelopeWorldEnv.acceptMessage(AMessage msg)
    Process a message received by the EFinder agent, by returning an appropriate answer It should answer to moveto and detectsat messages
    AMessage
    EnvelopeFinder.DetectsAt()
    Send to the environment object the question: "Does the detector sense something around(agentX,agentY) ?"
    AMessage
    EnvelopeFinder.moveTo(int x, int y)
    Use agent "actuators" to move to (x,y) We simulate this by telling to the World Agent (environment) that we want to move, but we need the answer from it to be sure that the movement was made with success
    AMessage
    EnvelopeFinder.moveToNext()
    Ask the agent to move to the next position, by sending an appropriate message to the environment object.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    AMessage
    EnvelopeWorldEnv.acceptMessage(AMessage msg)
    Process a message received by the EFinder agent, by returning an appropriate answer It should answer to moveto and detectsat messages
    void
    EnvelopeFinder.processDetectorSensorAnswer(AMessage ans)
    Process the answer obtained for the query "Detects at (x,y)?"
    void
    EnvelopeFinder.processMoveAnswer(AMessage moveans)
    Process the answer obtained from the environment when we asked to perform a movement
